title: When trying to run beacon chain recieving error slice out of bounds
body:
After running

./prysm.sh beacon-chain --execution-endpoint=http://localhost:8551 --jwt-secret=jwt.hex --suggested-fee-recipient=0x*


ERROR main: Runtime panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range [::2474945000] with length 2147483647

I am running the latest stable release of ubuntu.
@A-Link-To-The-Future Do you mind pasting the whole panic ? Otherwise its hard for us to investigate this

2022-11-06 18:23:08] ERROR main: Runtime panic: runtime error: slice bounds out of range [::2474945000] with length 2147483647
goroutine 1 [running]:

This might indicate that your db has been corrupted
what steps should i take to renew my db then?

You can take a look here:
https://docs.prylabs.network/docs/prysm-usage/checkpoint-sync

./prysm.sh beacon-chain --checkpoint-sync-url=http://localhost:3500 --genesis-beacon-api-url=http://localhost:3500
ran this command and recieved the same error

You need to remove your old db first. You can run it with `--clear-db` first
i'm still recieving the same error. should i manually remove beaconchain.db from the .eth2 folder?
Yes, you can do that too
That appears to have worked, thank you!
